name: TheStrangeBob
description:
Controls:

WASD > Move

Left Mouse Click OR "E" > Attack

Space > Jump


Description

Just a prototype to learn this amazing engine, with an enemy, moving platforms, a hidden area and other stuffs.

Offtopic

If you guys are interested in Unity Editor Code Scripting and Code Generator for this purpose, you should check this project: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/xeditorhelper-editorcodegenerato...  

It also have a forum: https://forum.unity.com/threads/xeditorhelper-editor-code-generator.515676/
